name: Sugar Coffee
description:
This game is about a coffee bean trying to escape from a sugar crystal. If the sugar crystal can catch the coffee bean within a minute, high-calorie coffee is prepared, hence coffee loses. On the other hand, if the coffee bean survives for a minute against the chasing sugar crystal, the coffee bean wins and zero-sugar coffee  (black coffee) is prepared.  

This game has two modes: computer and multiplayer.

While playing against the computer you are the coffee bean, trying to escape the sugar crystal on 5 different maps. While playing it in the two-player mode, your friend can become the sugar crystal who'll try catching you

Note: The two-player game can only be played on touchscreen devices

For more info click the 'i' button on the home page of the game

Control Instructions:

  1. Use the mouse/ touchpad to control the player using the joystick (for laptop/ PC players)
  2. Use your thumb to move the player while on a touchscreen device (for mobile devices)
